resources.string: HOW TO PLAY: The objective of the game is to not draw an Exploding Kitten card. During your turn, youcan play any amount of playable cards, trade 2 identical cards, trade 3 identical cards, trade 5 unique cards, or play no cards.When you are done playing cards you can press the "End Turn" button to draw a card. *Every turn, you must draw a card or skip your turn. *The screen will flash red if you make an invalid move.
Skips your turn. Forces the next player to draw two cards. Can be stacked.
Takes a random card from another player.
Allows you to see the top 3 cards only.
Cancels a previously played Attack, Skip, or Nope Card.
In the game, you can trade 2 identical cards in order to steal a random card from another player
First, press the Trade 2 button and select your two cards. Next, select a player to target (represented by a card back). Finally, press the enter button to confirm your action.
